Content: does somebody know in which interval iguana tries to connect to other notaries? Does method addnotary force a connection attempt?

Content: not really.

Author: blackjok3r#3181

Author: Mylo#8306
Content: This is a performance tuning exercise.  Some ppl do it, some don't.  Obv YMMV depending on whether you do it, method you do it and there are different variables for different ppl that they need to tune, e.g. location of server, speed of server, number of UTXOs already in wallet etc.

Author: Mylo#8306
Content: There is no wrong/right way, it's your node.  You're just competing with the other nodes to be included in the sortition.

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: Why not learn how to do it properly the first time, but yes, own experimentation will be the best thing to do in the long run

Author: Mylo#8306
Content: because i like to sleep üòÉ  so anything below 50 UTXOs gets a refill!
